name: Payal
bio: X studied film-making at Vassar College & NYU's Tisch School of the Arts. She has worked at Mira Nair’s Mirabai Films, the Tribeca Film Festival before launching her own production and distribution company, FilmKaravan. Her short film, Grant St. Shaving Co. won three international awards and played at over a dozen festivals worldwide.

name: Samir
bio: Samir is the publisher of scroll.in, a digital daily of news, politics, and culture. He also founded ACK Media (2007) which grew to become India’s largest children's media company (acquired by the Future Group, 2011). Prior to ACK, he was an Associate Partner at McKinsey Company, New York.
